info.task: narrow down matching options in filled in expanded combobox
info.title: Narrow down the matching options in a filled in, expanded combobox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandComboboxAndSetValueToAWithInputTextDeselected
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the combobox, sets the combobox value to 'a', and de-selects all text in the input

user: With focus on the combobox, type a character to narrow down the number of matching options in the listbox popup.
instructions.raw: With focus on the combobox, type a character to narrow down the number of matching options in the listbox popup.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Text of the automatically completed option ('Alabama') is conveyed
State of the text in the input (selected) is conveyed
